name: Lucky You? Bancit Kantunan
description:
A downloadable game for Windows, Linux, and Mac!

After months of toiling as a university student, you find yourself in the middle of a classic crack RomCom! Navigate the days leading up to your university fair, and maybe find the perfect flavor to spice up your night! 

FEATURING 

  • 16 unique (and silly) events for ~2 hours of gameplay
  • 4 CGs
  • 5 Character Profiles
  • 11 Endings
  • Dashes of Tagalog language, given game's setting
